TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyGridEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class PropertyGridEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供一个编辑器控件，最终用户使用该控件可以编辑关联的 或服务器控件的自定义属性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit custom properties on an associated or server control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 提供了一个 (UI) 的泛型用户界面，用户可以使用该界面编辑位于 区域中的和服务器控件上的自定义属性 。The provides a generic user interface (UI) that enables users to edit custom properties on and server controls placed in zones. 相反，其他控件（如 和 控件）只编辑类中现有的、面向 UI 的属性 。In contrast, the other controls, such as the and controls, edit only existing, UI-oriented properties from the class. 正如 Web 部件控件集中的面向工具的区域 (有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述) ，提供面向工具的部件控件，其中每个控件都必须位于相应的工具区域中。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls, and each of these must reside in a corresponding type of tool zone. Web 部件控件集中的这类控件具有两个区分特征：These kind of controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它们是帮助者控件，使最终用户能够个性化窗体，这些控件在 Web 部件应用程序中构成页面的主要用户界面。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize the controls that form the primary UI of a page in a Web Parts application. - 它们仅在某些页面显示模式中可见。They are visible only in certain page display modes. 控件是一种特殊的控件，仅当网页处于编辑模式时，并且用户选择了特定的 或服务器控件进行编辑时，此控件才可见。The control is a special control, and it becomes visible only when a Web page is in edit mode, and when a specific or server control has been selected by a user for editing. 与所有其他 控件一样，控件必须位于 页面上的某个区域中。The control, like all other controls, must reside in an zone on the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含 控件，而 不能将控件置于任何其他类型的区域中。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 控件为源代码中标记的属性提供了一个编辑 UI，该属性是在 `WebBrowsable`) 类的属性 ( 。The control provides an editing UI for properties that are marked in the source code with the `WebBrowsable` attribute (from the class). 使用此特性标记属性时， 控件将基于属性的类型创建编辑 UI，并在需要时使用 对象将每个编辑控件中的值转换为属性的类型。When a property is marked with this attribute, a control creates the editing UI based on the type of the property, and uses a object if needed to convert the value in each editing control to the type of the property. 您还可以添加其他属性，以帮助 控件显示编辑 UI。You can also add other attributes that help the control to display the editing UI. `WebDisplayName`类) 中的特性 ( 允许您为在编辑 UI 中显示的每个控件指定显示的标签文本。The `WebDisplayName` attribute (from the class) allows you to specify the text for the label that appears with each control in the editing UI. `WebDescription`类) 中的特性 ( 允许您指定一个字符串，该字符串在编辑 UI 中显示为每个控件的工具提示。The `WebDescription` attribute (from the class) allows you to specify a string that appears as a ToolTip for each control in the editing UI. 下表列出了为编辑各种类型的属性而创建的控件。The controls created to edit properties of various types are listed in the following table. |属性类型Property type|用于编辑属性的控件Control created to edit the property| |-------------------|------------------------------------------| |字符串String|| |Int、Float、UnitInt, Float, Unit|| |BooleanBoolean|| || (包含枚举值的列表) (contains the list of enumerated values)| ||| 类具有一个 属性，该属性用于获取或设置控件的可见标题文本。The class has a property, which is used to get or set the visible title text for the control. 还有一个受保护的 属性，该属性确定当页面进入编辑模式时是否显示该控件。There is also a protected property, which determines whether the control is displayed when the page enters edit mode. 类还具有两个重要的方法： 和 ，它们从类继承 并重写。The class also has two important methods, and , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 方法非常重要，因为它们允许获取和设置编辑器控件的字段值和正在编辑的控件的属性之间的属性值 。The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the control being edited. 由于 控件只允许您编辑自定义属性，因此您将需要 Web 部件控件集中的其他控件来编辑控件的外观、布局和行为 。Because the control allows you to edit only custom properties, you will need the other controls in the Web Parts control set to edit the appearance, layout, and behavior of controls. 其他控件包括 、 和 控件。The other controls include the , the , and the controls. 这些 控件应提供编辑控件所需的大多数编辑功能 ，但如有必要，还可以通过从类继承来创建自定义编辑器控件 。These controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but if necessary, you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a code example, see the class overview topic. > [!NOTE] > 为了提高可访问性， 控件在元素中呈现 `
` 。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素对用于在控件中进行编辑的相关控件集进行分组 ，并为视觉用户代理 (（例如普通 Web 浏览器) 和面向语音的用户代理 (如屏幕阅读软件) 等）中的控件提供选项卡式导航。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上声明控件，并使其能够编辑控件的多个 UI 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件和控件的网页 ，以及对自定义控件的引用 。A Web page that contains an control and a control, along with a reference to a custom control. - 一个包含自定义控件的类 。A class that contains the custom control. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 该用户控件的源代码来自其他主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 要使此代码示例正常运行，你需要从 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) 主题中获取该用户控件的 .ascx 文件，并将该文件放在此代码示例中 .aspx 页面所在的同一文件夹中。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含对控件的声明性引用 ，其中包含一个子 `` 元素，其中包含对控件的声明性引用 。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains a declarative reference to a control. 页面引用自定义 控件，对 `Register` 程序集使用指令，并使用控件的 `` 元素。The page references the custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是一个名为的自定义 类 `UserInfoWebPart` ，在网页中被引用。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `UserInfoWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page. 请注意，包含有关用户的信息的各种属性均使用特性进行标记 `WebBrowsable` 。Notice that the various properties that contain information about a user are all marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 这使 控件能够提供用于编辑这些属性的 UI。This enables the control to provide the UI for editing those properties. 属性也使用特性进行标记 `WebDisplayName` ，以指定显示在编辑 UI 中每个控件旁边的标签文本。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#5)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以在 " **用户信息" Web 部件** 控件的标题栏中 (向下箭头) 单击谓词菜单，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见后，可以看到 控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 请注意，将基于属性的类型为类的每个属性呈现一个控件 `UserInfoWebPart` 。Notice that a control is rendered for each of the properties of the `UserInfoWebPart` class, based on the type of the property. 如果在编辑 UI 中进行一些更改，并单击 " **应用** " 按钮，则可以使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表将页面返回到浏览模式，并查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

summary.span: 创建该类的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认构造函数; 类中没有声明任何构造函数 ，因此在创建类的新实例时，不会执行任何特殊任务。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();
override this.ApplyChanges : unit -> bool

summary.span: 将 控件的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将 值保存到 的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果发生错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the to the is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法 。The method is a critical method on a control. 方法将用户在控件上设置的值保存 到关联控件中的相应属性 。The method saves the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 关联的控件在 控件的继承属性中引用 。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不能重写 方法，因为 类型是密封的，以防止从它继承。You cannot override the method because the type is sealed to prevent inheriting from it. 但是，如果您需要对编辑控件所提供的不同控件属性的过程进行更多的编程控制 ，则可以创建自定义 控件并提供您自己的此方法的实现。However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various control properties than the control provides, you can create a custom control and provide your own implementation of this method. 有关代码示例，请参见 方法。For a code example, see the method. 此 方法尝试设置关联控件中公共自定义属性的值 ，前提是这些属性都具有 `[WebBrowsable(true)]` 属性。The method attempts to set the values on public custom properties in the associated control, provided that those properties each have a `[WebBrowsable(true)]` attribute. 当用户在编辑用户界面 (UI) 中单击表示 "确定" 或 "应用" 谓词的按钮时，将调用方法。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). 如果需要保存编辑的值而不是用户操作，也可以直接从自己的代码中调用它。You can also call it directly from your own code if there is a need to save the edited values apart from user actions.

exception.span: 尝试设置关联 的属性值时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated .
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 重写从 控件继承的基属性以在设计器中隐藏该属性，并防止它受主题影响。

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含接收 控件中的默认焦点的 控件的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此属性是公共的，但它用于此控件的默认呈现，不应从开发人员代码调用。Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };
member this.Display : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false` 如果基属性的值也为，则属性返回 `false` 。The property returns `false` if the value on the base property is also `false`. 否则，如果要编辑的控件不是 `null` ，则显示该 控件。Otherwise, if the control to be edited is not `null`, then the control is displayed. 仅当页面处于编辑模式且 已选择控件进行编辑时，此属性才适用。The property applies only when a page is in edit mode, and a control has been selected for editing.

summary.span: 检索 控件的值，并更新 控件中用于编辑这些属性值的相应控件。

span.span: Retrieves the values from a control, and updates the corresponding controls used to edit those property values within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法 。The method is a critical method on a control. 它实现基类中的 方法，检索关联控件中的当前值 ，并使用这些值更新控件中的控件， 以便用户可以对其进行编辑。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 只要关联控件中的值发生更改，就会调用方法 。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 对于 控件， 包含控件的区域将 在调用方法之后立即调用方法 ，以使控件中的值 始终与关联控件中的值同步 。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 调用方法的另一种情况 是在 控件进入编辑模式时。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在编辑模式中可见时，属性值显示在控件的标题栏中。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 在页面中声明控件时，可以为属性设置一个值 `Title` 。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，则提供特定于区域性的默认值。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is supplied. 属性重写基属性，以便在未提供任何标题值的情况下， 可通过 Web 部件控件集来提供适用于控件的默认标题。The property overrides the base property so that, if no title value is supplied, a default title appropriate to a control can be supplied by the Web Parts control set. ## Examples 此代码示例演示如何使用控件的 属性 。This code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页中以声明方式设置控件的标题。The following code example shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的下一部分演示如何以编程方式设置属性的值 。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. 为了保持以编程方式分配的值，将使用一个名为的静态变量 `editControlTitle` ，并在每次初始化控件时将此值分配给该 属性，以便在回发事件之间保留值。In order to persist the programmatically assigned value, a static variable named `editControlTitle` is used, and this value is assigned to the property each time the control is initialized, so that the value is persisted between postback events. [!code-csharp[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/CS/propertyGridEditorPartCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PropertyGridEditorPart_Overview/VB/propertyGridEditorPartVB.aspx#3)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以在 " **用户信息" Web 部件** 控件的标题栏中 (向下箭头) 单击谓词菜单，然后单击 " **编辑** " 开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到 控件，并将其置于其上方的按钮和文本框。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 请注意，控件的标题 是在网页的声明性标记中分配给它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果在 " **更新 EditorPart 标题** " 按钮旁边的文本框中输入一些文本，然后单击按钮，则会更新控件的标题。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
